reviews.review_msg: Extremely easy credit. Paula is forthcoming and excited about what she teaches. Graded on 5 open book quizzes (can retake 3 times), and 5 assignments. No lectures just readings (which you don't really need to read besides for assignments. Marking is fair. If you put in effort, you'll get a great grade so it's definitely a gpa booster.
One of the best teachers I've ever had. Paula is kind, reasonable, and very knowledgeable about what she teaches. She gives great feedback too so take advantage of that if you need it!

What a joke! Not really hard but changes assignment instructions at the last minute of the course and doesn't even post it on the assignments page! She instead decides to place the changes made in an essay long email that realistically no student wants to read! And then we get penalized! Hopefully she will be more intelligent going forward!!!
